__TOC__

Launchpad engineer.  InstallerTeam member.  Former <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntu.com/community/processes/council|Ubuntu Community Council]]</nowiki> member; former <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntu.com/community/processes/techboard|Ubuntu Technical Board]]</nowiki> member; former technical lead for Canonical's FoundationsTeam.

Outside Ubuntu, I'm a d-i hacker in Debian, and generally maintain a bunch of stuff.

Please put general thoughts on mailing lists or elsewhere on the wiki, and bugs in <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu|Launchpad]]</nowiki>, rather than leaving messages here.
